info.summary:
Nitin Indurkhya works as a visiting professor in University of New South Wales School of Computer Science & Engg. Sydney 2052 NSW Australia, and his\her h-index is 17, g-index is 48. His\Her interests are :
 Decision Rule; Decision Tree; Machine Learning; Rule Based; Text Mining;
